verses.verse: ( The Feeding of the Four Thousand) ( ( 120 4:42-44 ; 470 15:29-39 )) Ἐν <WG1722> En In ἐκείναις <WG1565> ekeinais those ταῖς <WG3588> tais - ἡμέραις <WG2250> hēmerais days πάλιν <WG3825> palin once again πολλοῦ <WG4183> pollou very large , ὄχλου <WG3793> ochlou [the] crowd ὄντος <WG1510> ontos became καὶ <WG2532> kai and μὴ <WG3361> mē nothing ἐχόντων <WG2192> echontōn they had τί <WG5101> ti vvv φάγωσιν <WG5315> phagōsin to eat . προσκαλεσάμενος <WG4341> proskalesamenos [Jesus] called τοὺς <WG3588> tous the μαθητὰς <WG3101> mathētas disciples to Him λέγει <WG3004> legei [and] said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois - ,

Σπλαγχνίζομαι <WG4697> Splanchnizomai “ I have compassion ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi for τὸν <WG3588> ton [this] ὄχλον <WG3793> ochlon crowd , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti because ἤδη <WG2235> ēdē . . . ἡμέραι <WG2250> hēmerai days τρεῖς <WG5140> treis three προσμένουσίν <WG4357> prosmenousin they have already been μοι <WG1473> moi with Me καὶ <WG2532> kai and οὐκ <WG3756> ouk nothing ἔχουσιν <WG2192> echousin have τί <WG5101> ti vvv φάγωσιν <WG5315> phagōsin to eat .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐὰν <WG1437> ean If ἀπολύσω <WG630> apolysō I send αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them νήστεις <WG3523> nēsteis hungry , εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv οἶκον <WG3624> oikon home αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn vvv ἐκλυθήσονται <WG1590> eklythēsontai they will faint ἐν <WG1722> en along τῇ <WG3588> tē the ὁδῷ <WG3598> hodō way . καί <WG2532> kai For τινες <WG5100> tines some αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn of them ἀπὸ <WG575> apo vvv μακρόθεν <WG3113> makrothen a great distance . ” ἥκασιν* <WG2240> hēkasin have come

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀπεκρίθησαν <WG611> apekrithēsan replied αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Πόθεν <WG4159> Pothen “ Where τούτους <WG3778> toutous all these [people] ? ” δυνήσεταί <WG1410> dynēsetai could τις <WG5100> tis anyone ὧδε <WG5602> hōde . . . χορτάσαι <WG5526> chortasai to feed ἄρτων <WG740> artōn [find enough] bread ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ in ἐρημίας <WG2047> erēmias this desolate place

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἠρώτα <WG2065> ērōta [Jesus] asked αὐτούς <WG846> autous - . Πόσους <WG4214> Posous “ How many ἔχετε <WG2192> echete do you have ? ” ἄρτους <WG740> artous loaves Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan they replied . Ἑπτά <WG2033> Hepta “ Seven , ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And παραγγέλλει <WG3853> parangellei He instructed τῷ <WG3588> tō the ὄχλῳ <WG3793> ochlō crowd ἀναπεσεῖν <WG377> anapesein to sit down ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τῆς <WG3588> tēs the γῆς <WG1093> gēs ground . καὶ <WG2532> kai Then λαβὼν <WG2983> labōn He took τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven ἄρτους <WG740> artous loaves , εὐχαριστήσας <WG2168> eucharistēsas gave thanks ἔκλασεν <WG2806> eklasen [and] broke [them] , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐδίδου <WG1325> edidou gave [them] τοῖς <WG3588> tois to μαθηταῖς <WG3101> mathētais disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἵνα <WG2443> hina - παρατιθῶσιν <WG3908> paratithōsin to set before [the people] . καὶ <WG2532> kai And παρέθηκαν <WG3908> parethēkan they distributed [them] τῷ <WG3588> tō to the ὄχλῳ <WG3793> ochlō crowd .

καὶ <WG2532> kai . . . εἶχον* <WG2192> eichon They also had ἰχθύδια <WG2485> ichthydia small fish , ὀλίγα <WG3641> oliga a few καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐλογήσας <WG2127> eulogēsas [Jesus] blessed αὐτὰ <WG846> auta them εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen [and] ordered that καὶ <WG2532> kai as well . ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these παρατιθέναι <WG3908> paratithenai be set before [them]

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἔφαγον <WG5315> ephagon [The people] ate καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐχορτάσθησαν <WG5526> echortasthēsan were satisfied , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἦραν <WG142> ēran [the disciples] picked up περισσεύματα <WG4051> perisseumata that were left over . κλασμάτων <WG2801> klasmatōn of broken pieces ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven σπυρίδας <WG4711> spyridas basketfuls

ἦσαν <WG1510> ēsan were [ present ] . δὲ <WG1161> de And ὡς <WG5613> hōs about τετρακισχίλιοι <WG5070> tetrakischilioi four thousand [men] ( Men is implied here, that is, in addition to women and children; see .) καὶ <WG2532> kai As soon as ἀπέλυσεν <WG630> apelysen [Jesus] had dismissed αὐτούς <WG846> autous [the crowd] ,

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys - ἐμβὰς <WG1684> embas He got εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to the πλοῖον <WG4143> ploion boat μετὰ <WG3326> meta with τῶν <WG3588> tōn - μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen [and] went εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὰ <WG3588> ta the μέρη <WG3313> merē district Δαλμανουθά <WG1148> Dalmanoutha of Dalmanutha .

( The Demand for a Sign) ( ( 470 16:1-4 ; 490 12:54-56 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἐξῆλθον <WG1831> exēlthon came οἱ <WG3588> hoi the Φαρισαῖοι <WG5330> Pharisaioi Pharisees καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἤρξαντο <WG756> ērxanto began συζητεῖν <WG4802> syzētein to argue with αὐτῷ <WG846> autō [Jesus] , ζητοῦντες <WG2212> zētountes [by] demanding παρ’ <WG3844> par’ from αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him σημεῖον <WG4592> sēmeion a sign ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τοῦ <WG3588> tou - οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven . πειράζοντες <WG3985> peirazontes testing αὐτόν <WG846> auton Him

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀναστενάξας <WG389> anastenaxas [Jesus] sighed deeply τῷ <WG3588> tō in πνεύματι <WG4151> pneumati spirit αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His λέγει <WG3004> legei [and] said , Τί <WG5101> Ti “ Why ἡ <WG3588> hē - γενεὰ <WG1074> genea generation αὕτη <WG3778> hautē does this ζητεῖ <WG2212> zētei demand σημεῖον <WG4592> sēmeion a sign ? ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn Truly λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , εἰ <WG1487> ei no δοθήσεται <WG1325> dothēsetai will be given τῇ <WG3588> tē - γενεᾷ <WG1074> genea generation . ” ταύτῃ <WG3778> tautē to this σημεῖον <WG4592> sēmeion sign

καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἀφεὶς <WG863> apheis He left αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them , πάλιν <WG3825> palin . . . , ἐμβὰς <WG1684> embas got back into the boat ἀπῆλθεν <WG565> apēlthen [and] crossed εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὸ <WG3588> to the πέραν <WG4008> peran other side .

( The Leaven of the Pharisees and of Herod) ( ( 470 16:5-12 ; 490 12:1-3 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Now ἐπελάθοντο <WG1950> epelathonto [the disciples] had forgotten λαβεῖν <WG2983> labein to take ἄρτους <WG740> artous bread , καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἰ <WG1487> ei except for μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . ἕνα <WG1520> hena one ἄρτον <WG740> arton loaf οὐκ <WG3756> ouk - εἶχον <WG2192> eichon they had μεθ’ <WG3326> meth’ with ἑαυτῶν <WG1438> heautōn them ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the πλοίῳ <WG4143> ploiō boat .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - διεστέλλετο <WG1291> diestelleto He cautioned αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them λέγων <WG3004> legōn - . Ὁρᾶτε <WG3708> Horate “ Watch out ! ” βλέπετε <WG991> blepete “ Beware ἀπὸ <WG575> apo of τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ζύμης <WG2219> zymēs leaven τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the Φαρισαίων <WG5330> Pharisaiōn Pharisees καὶ <WG2532> kai and τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ζύμης <WG2219> zymēs - Ἡρῴδου <WG2264> Hērōdou of Herod . ”

καὶ <WG2532> kai [So] διελογίζοντο <WG1260> dielogizonto they began to discuss πρὸς <WG4314> pros with ἀλλήλους <WG240> allēlous one another ὅτι <WG3754> hoti the fact that ἄρτους <WG740> artous bread . οὐκ <WG3756> ouk no ἔχουσιν <WG2192> echousin they had

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai vvv γνοὺς <WG1097> gnous Aware of [their conversation] , λέγει <WG3004> legei [Jesus] asked αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Τί <WG5101> Ti “ Why διαλογίζεσθε <WG1260> dialogizesthe are you debating ὅτι <WG3754> hoti about ἄρτους <WG740> artous bread ? οὐκ <WG3756> ouk no ἔχετε <WG2192> echete having οὔπω <WG3768> oupō vvv νοεῖτε <WG3539> noeite Do you still not see οὐδὲ <WG3761> oude or συνίετε <WG4920> syniete understand ? πεπωρωμένην <WG4456> pepōrōmenēn such hard ἔχετε <WG2192> echete Do you have τὴν <WG3588> tēn - καρδίαν <WG2588> kardian hearts ? ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn . . .

Ὀφθαλμοὺς <WG3788> Ophthalmous eyes , ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes ‘ Having οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv βλέπετε <WG991> blepete do you not see ? καὶ <WG2532> kai And ὦτα <WG3775> ōta ears , ἔχοντες <WG2192> echontes having οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἀκούετε <WG191> akouete do you not hear ? ’ ( See , , , and .) καὶ <WG2532> kai And οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μνημονεύετε <WG3421> mnēmoneuete do you not remember ?

ὅτε <WG3753> hote When τοὺς <WG3588> tous the πέντε <WG4002> pente five ἄρτους <WG740> artous loaves ἔκλασα <WG2806> eklasa I broke εἰς <WG1519> eis for τοὺς <WG3588> tous the πεντακισχιλίους <WG4000> pentakischilious five thousand , πόσους <WG4214> posous how many κοφίνους <WG2894> kophinous basketfuls κλασμάτων <WG2801> klasmatōn of broken pieces πλήρεις <WG4134> plēreis . . . ἤρατε <WG142> ērate did you collect ? ” Λέγουσιν <WG3004> Legousin they answered αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Δώδεκα <WG1427> Dōdeka “ Twelve , ”

Ὅτε <WG3753> Hote when [I broke] ‹καὶ› <WG2532> kai “ And τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἑπτὰ <WG2033> hepta seven [loaves] εἰς <WG1519> eis for τοὺς <WG3588> tous the τετρακισχιλίους <WG5070> tetrakischilious four thousand , πόσων <WG4214> posōn how many σπυρίδων <WG4711> spyridōn basketfuls πληρώματα <WG4138> plērōmata . . . κλασμάτων <WG2801> klasmatōn of broken pieces ἤρατε <WG142> ērate did you collect ? ” Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - λέγουσιν <WG3004> legousin said . ‹αὐτῷ› <WG846> autō they Ἑπτά <WG2033> Hepta “ Seven , ”
Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen He asked αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Οὔπω <WG3768> Oupō “ vvv συνίετε <WG4920> syniete Do you still not understand ? ”

( The Blind Man at Bethsaida) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai [When] ἔρχονται <WG2064> erchontai they arrived εἰς <WG1519> eis at Βηθσαϊδάν <WG966> Bēthsaidan Bethsaida , Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - φέρουσιν <WG5342> pherousin [some people] brought αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - τυφλὸν <WG5185> typhlon a blind [man] καὶ <WG2532> kai and παρακαλοῦσιν <WG3870> parakalousin begged αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] ἵνα <WG2443> hina to αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou him . ἅψηται <WG680> hapsētai touch

καὶ <WG2532> kai So ἐπιλαβόμενος <WG1949> epilabomenos He took τῆς <WG3588> tēs by the χειρὸς <WG5495> cheiros hand τοῦ <WG3588> tou the τυφλοῦ <WG5185> typhlou blind [man] ἐξήνεγκεν <WG1627> exēnenken [and] led him αὐτὸν <WG846> auton - ἔξω <WG1854> exō out τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the κώμης <WG2968> kōmēs village . καὶ <WG2532> kai Then πτύσας <WG4429> ptysas He spit εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὰ <WG3588> ta - ὄμματα <WG3659> ommata eyes αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [the man’s] ἐπιθεὶς <WG2007> epitheis [and] placed τὰς <WG3588> tas [His] χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras hands αὐτῷ <WG846> autō on him . ἐπηρώτα <WG1905> epērōta He asked αὐτόν <WG846> auton - . Εἴ <WG1487> Ei “ vvv τι <WG5100> ti anything ? ” βλέπεις <WG991> blepeis Can you see

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἀναβλέψας <WG308> anablepsas [The man] looked up ἔλεγεν <WG2036> elegen [and] said , Βλέπω <WG991> Blepō “ I can see τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἀνθρώπους <WG444> anthrōpous people , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti [but] ὡς <WG5613> hōs like δένδρα <WG1186> dendra trees ὁρῶ <WG3708> horō they look περιπατοῦντας <WG4043> peripatountas walking around . ”

Εἶτα <WG1534> Eita Once again πάλιν <WG3825> palin . . . ἐπέθηκεν <WG2007> epethēken [Jesus] placed τὰς <WG3588> tas [His] χεῖρας <WG5495> cheiras hands ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on τοὺς <WG3588> tous - ὀφθαλμοὺς <WG3788> ophthalmous eyes , αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [the man’s] καὶ <WG2532> kai and when διέβλεψεν <WG1227> dieblepsen he opened them καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀπεκατέστη <WG600> apekatestē [his sight] was restored , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐνέβλεπεν <WG1689> eneblepen he could see τηλαυγῶς <WG5081> tēlaugōs clearly . ἅπαντα <WG537> hapanta everything

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἀπέστειλεν <WG649> apesteilen [Jesus] sent αὐτὸν <WG846> auton him εἰς <WG1519> eis vvv οἶκον <WG3624> oikon home αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou vvv λέγων <WG3004> legōn [and] said , Μηδὲ <WG3366> Mēde “ vvv εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the κώμην <WG2968> kōmēn village .” ( BYZ and TR “Do not go and tell anyone in the village.”) εἰσέλθῃς <WG1525> eiselthēs Do not go back

( Peter’s Confession of Christ) ( ( 470 16:13-20 ; 490 9:18-20 ; 500 6:67-71 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then ἐξῆλθεν <WG1831> exēlthen went on ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὰς <WG3588> tas the κώμας <WG2968> kōmas villages Καισαρείας <WG2542> Kaisareias around Caesarea τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Φιλίππου <WG5376> Philippou Philippi . καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐν <WG1722> en On τῇ <WG3588> tē the ὁδῷ <WG3598> hodō way , ἐπηρώτα <WG1905> epērōta He questioned τοὺς <WG3588> tous - μαθητὰς <WG3101> mathētas disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His λέγων <WG3004> legōn - αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois - : Τίνα <WG5101> Tina “ Who με <WG1473> me I λέγουσιν <WG3004> legousin say οἱ <WG3588> hoi - ἄνθρωποι <WG444> anthrōpoi do people εἶναι <WG1510> einai am ? ”

Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de - εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan They replied αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes . . . ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , Ἰωάννην <WG2491> Iōannēn “ [Some say] John τὸν <WG3588> ton the Βαπτιστήν <WG910> Baptistēn Baptist ; καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi others [say] Ἠλίαν <WG2243> Ēlian Elijah ; ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi others , δὲ <WG1161> de and still ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - εἷς <WG1520> heis one τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the προφητῶν <WG4396> prophētōn prophets . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - αὐτὸς <WG846> autos [Jesus] ἐπηρώτα <WG1905> epērōta asked αὐτούς <WG846> autous - . Ὑμεῖς <WG4771> Hymeis you ? ” δὲ <WG1161> de “ But [what about] τίνα <WG5101> tina “ Who με <WG1473> me I λέγετε <WG3004> legete do you say εἶναι <WG1510> einai am ? ” Ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> Apokritheis answered ὁ <WG3588> ho - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter λέγει <WG3004> legei - αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - , Σὺ <WG4771> Sy “ You εἶ <WG1510> ei are ὁ <WG3588> ho the Χριστός <WG5547> Christos Christ . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And ἐπετίμησεν <WG2008> epetimēsen [Jesus] warned αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them ἵνα <WG2443> hina - μηδενὶ <WG3367> mēdeni . . . λέγωσιν <WG3004> legōsin not to tell anyone περὶ <WG4012> peri about αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him .
